summary: Add Ryan Cannon, the spell guard follower to game. Mage players will find him extremely useful, while other classes can also benefit from him.
descriptionHtml:
[size=6][center][b][u][color=#f1c232]Ryan Cannon Follower[/color][/u][/b][/center][/size][color=#cc4125][size=4][center]by viwi[/center][/size][/color][size=3][b][i][color=#00ffff]
[center][/center][/color][/i][/b][/size][center][color=#ffff00][size=4][b][i][u]Ryan Cannon
[/u][/i][/b][/size][/color]
[color=#00ffff]Gender:[/color] [color=#ffff00][size=2]Male[/size][/color]
[color=#00ffff]Race:[/color] [color=#ffff00][size=2]Nord (Customized)[/size][/color]
[color=#00ffff]Height:[/color] [color=#ffff00][size=2]1.00[/size][/color]
[color=#00ffff]Weight:[/color] [color=#ffff00][size=2]80[/size][/color]
[color=#00ffff]Body Type:[/color] [color=#ffff00][size=2][url=https://www.loverslab.com/files/file/498-sos-schlongs-of-skyrim/]SOS (Schlongs of Skyrim)[/url][/size][/color]
[color=#00ffff]Standalone:[/color][color=#ffff00][size=2]Yes[/size][/color]
[color=#00ffff]Class:[/color] [color=#ffff00][size=2]Spell Guard (Ranger+SpellSword)[/size][/color]
[color=#00ffff]Spells & Skills:[/color][size=2] [color=#ffff00]Cannonball shooting + Ice Bomb + Whip Lash in Melee + Lockpicking
[color=#00ffff]Location:[/color]Blue Palace, Solitude[/color][/size][/center]



[center][color=#ff7700][size=4][b]Features[/b][/size][/color][/center][color=#ffff00]Ryan is meant to be the typical kind of American lad (in my opinion, stereotype perhaps): charming, strong, sexually attractive, full of energy, somehow selfish and loves EXPLOSIONS! I made him especially for mage players as I'm playing one, and have found myself most of the times helplessly fighting alone. I tried to recruit some followers (vanilla or modded), but none is quite mage-friendly. Plus, I'm always jealous on how the Thalmor wizards having a bunch of soldiers guarding their sides. So, here comes Ryan in the awesome [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/86628/?]Light Eleven Armor[/url] by [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/6973877/?]RefurbMadness[/url](a real angel!), and character built as a "Spell Guard". Why not make him your own personal Thalmor bodyguard and enjoy!

So what does he do? To sum it up, he is the kind of companion that won't steal your thunder yet still proves quite useful in combat. And talking about details, normally he is ranged with a cannon-like crossbow, which with a chance disarms your foes; besides, every 30 seconds he throws an ice bomb that explodes by 30 points of frost damage while freezing enemies within an area of 50 ft.. In melee, he wields a whip [/color](originally like in the screenshots but the author refused to let me use his work, so now it's just an Elven Dagger with visual effects of Miraak's Sword instead)[color=#ffff00] and each strike fears the target for 5 seconds. More importantly, he provides the Brilliance Aura effect that reduces your casting cost while increases your spell power and magicka regeneration. Last but not least, with a lockpick given, he can pick most of the locks as you commanded (adjusted with his level).[/color]





[center][color=#ff7700][size=4][b]Options[/b][/size][/color]
[color=#ffff00]1. Normal Body Set with Under-Chin Shadows (which gives Ryan's face a more 3d feel)[/color]
[color=#ffff00]2. Oily Body Set with no shadow under chin (which makes Ryan look more smooth and moist）[/color][/center][color=#ffff00]

[/color][center][/center]


[center][color=#ff7700][size=4][b]Requirements:[/b][/size][/color][size=2]
[color=#ffff00]DawnGuard DLC
Dragonborn DLC[/color][/size][/center]



[color=#ff7700][size=4][b][center]Compatibility[/center][/b][/size][/color][color=#ffff00]Since I put Ryan in Blue Palace, you may need to consider about the compatibility issues with mods that change the palace's interior setting. I have tested[/color] [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/67249/?]Palaces and Castles Enhanced - The Royal Blue Palace[/url][color=#ffff00], and they work fine together, though it may look kind of weird when you meet Ryan standing too close with a floor lamp. But generally speaking, it won't give you a crash game or anything like that.

[/color][color=#ffff00][center]Please make sure you've rearranged loading order before activating this mod if you're using any mod that's like the one I mentioned.[/center][/color]



[center][color=#ff7700][size=4][b]Bugs And Issues
[/b][/size][/color][color=#ffff00]Haven't found any. 
Esp file cleaned with TES5Edit, tested with clean and normal save. So far so good.
[/color][color=#ffff00]Ryan's eyes may reflect blue lights under certain light circumstances, depending on your ENB, but it should not be a problem.[/color][/center]



[color=#ff7700][size=4][b][center]Special Credit:[/center][/b][/size][/color][center][b][u][size=2][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/6973877]RefurbMadness[/url] [/size][/u][/b][/center][size=2][center][color=#ffff00]I cannot thank you enough for your generosity. Ryan is so lucky to have your[/color][b] [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/86628/?]Light Elven Armor for SoS[/url] [/b][color=#ffff00]as his default armor set. [/color][/center][/size][size=2][center][/center][color=#ffff00]And anyone wanting Ryan to switch back to the elven armor after being dressed differently should download [/color][color=#ea9999][b]↑[/b][/color][color=#ffff00] , since the default armors are unobtainable.[/color] 
[/size]
[center][color=#ffff00]And thank [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2840931]MateredDyn[/url] for the wonderful screenshot! It's amazzzzzing! Thank you so much![/color][/center]
